New Records: Zack Wheeler recorded 17 double-digit strikeout performances since joining the Phillies in 2020, moving him past Chris Short for seventh-most in franchise history, dating back to 1883.
Key Match Events: Zack Wheeler struck out 11 against the Washington Nationals, extending an historic streak and joining an exclusive list of legends.
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies' decision to extend Wheeler in March looks smarter and smarter as he continues to put together one of his most dominant seasons yet.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zack Wheeler is now 59-32 with a 2.94 ERA, 1.031 WHIP and 25.5 WAR as a member of the Phillies, averaging 9.8 strikeouts per nine innings.
Others: The Phillies will have one more game against Washington on Sunday before the regular season comes to a close.
